Name: World Cup Soccer
Description: Thirty-two nations play, but billions of people in countries all around the world drop everything they’re doing for a month every four years to see who claims the title of World Cup soccer champion.

Name: Half Marathon 2018
Description: In Kharkov will be the third Kharkov half-marathon. A new route in the center of the city. 2 courses to choose from - a classic half marathon (21,097 km) and 5 km.

Name: The National Basketball Association Finals
Description: The National Basketball Association’s finals are a showdown of stars and teams for the ages. It takes four games to win, but at least 93 games to get there.

Name: Surfing Major Events
Description: The World Surfing Games is an annual international surfing event organised by International Surfing Association (ISA).

Name: International Children's Games
Description: The International Children's Games are a multi-sport competition involving young athletes aged between 12 and 15 held every year.

Name: International Dance Championships
Description: The best dance talent from across the world can be seen competing with all the glamour that everyone expects at this highly prestigious and popular Dance Championship – one of the glittering social events of the year.

Name: World Boxing Championships
Description: The World Boxing Championship, organized by the International Boxing Association (AIBA), is a biennial amateur boxing competition. It was formerly known as the World Amateur Boxing Championship.

Name: Electric Daisy Carnival
Description: Electric Daisy Carnival Orlando is the Florida outpost of the global EDC festival series.

Name: The Social Festival 2018
Description: The Social Festival is a UK electronic music festival, held each September on Kent Country Showground in Maidstone.

Name: Austin City Limits Music Festival
Description: Austin City Limits Music Festival is a massive multi-genre festival in Texas' capital city. Begun in 2002, the festival is a six day, two weekend affair.

Name: Leopolis Jazz Fest
Description: The success of this festival went far beyond the borders of the country. It is considered to be among the ten best jazz events in Europe.

Name: Z-Games
Description: If listening to good music is too calm for you, you can join the extreme sports festival Z-Games. It is located on the banks of the Black Sea in the city of Zatoka.

Name: Molodist International
Description: Since 1970, the Molodist International Film Festival has supported young filmmakers and their short films. It takes place in the last week of October each year.

Name: Odessa Classics
Description: "Odesa Classics" is an international festival of academic music, which takes place in Odesa each year from 2015.

Name: Mystetskyi Arsenal
Description: Architectural and meaningful dominant of National Cultural-Art Museum Complex "Mystetskyi Arsenal" is the Old Arsenal building, an architectural monument of national importance.

Name: M17
Description: Аvant-garde art gallery is a pioneer, a scout in the contemporary art world. M17 Gallery has a symbolic meaning, codified in this strict minimalist abbreviation: "M" – young (ukr – “Molod”).
